entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 4:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 8.0°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 60 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local smoke. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 16.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local smoke. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
